text: (The Supreme Horror) when the Fire will be closed and death is slaughtered between Paradise and hell (will not grieve them, and the angels will welcome them) at the gate of Paradise with the good news, ((saying): This is your Day which you were promised) in the life of the world; the verses (Lo! you and that which you worship beside [�] This is your Day which ye were promised) were revealed regarding 'Abdullah Ibn al-Zib'ari al-Sahmi, the Poet, and his dispute with the Prophet (pbuh) because of the idols.
